attributes.action: save the village post office at Sutton Lane Ends, Cheshire from closure.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The village post office at 1 Tunnicliffe Road, Sutton Lane Ends, Cheshire SK11 0EB has been selected for Closure by the Post Office. The post office provides an invaluable service to the residents of Sutton, Langley and surrounding rural areas who will have to travel to Macclesfield to use Post Office services. The nearest Post Office will be 1.3 miles away making it a 2.6 mile round trip at least to the for a Sutton resident, many of whom are elderly and rely on Sutton PO for many of their essential services. Our post office is vital to the health of our community and is valued by the people of Sutton, Langley and surrounding countryside, and we demand it not be closed.
